name: World For All (WFA)
about: World For All aims to inspire co-existence between stray animals and the people of Mumbai, by Finding loving homes for the helpless ones and creating compassion, tolerance and humanity for those on the streets. Co-exist.
impact: Issues covered include Animal Homelessness, Overpopulation, Casualties & Indian Perceptions

compensation.description: Vet visits, pick up and drop of pets between potential foster and adopter homes
Foster a dog or cat temporarily till it finds a permanent home

locations.street_address: C/o World For All, 15A/21 Takshila, Mahakali Caves Road, Andheri East
